description: A role-based news sharing platform with article moderation, subscriptions, trending news, and an intuitive admin dashboard.
features: 📰 Role-Based Access – Admin, Premium, and Normal User roles
✍️ Article Posting Rules – Limited for normal users, unlimited for premium users
✅ Article Moderation – Approve, decline (with reason), or keep pending
📈 Trending News Slider – Showcasing the top 6 articles
💳 Subscription System – Automatic role update when premium expires
🔒 Secure Authentication – Login, registration, and JWT-based authorization
📊 Admin Dashboard – Manage users, articles, and payments
📱 Fully Responsive Design – Optimized for all devices
⏳ Real-Time Status Updates – Instant feedback on article approval status

description: RecipeBook is a full-stack recipe management platform that allows users to add, update, and like recipes, with a dedicated section for top-liked recipes. It offers filtering options for exploring all recipes, creating an interactive and engaging cooking experience for users.
features: 📝 Add new recipes
✏️ Update existing recipes
❤️ Like recipes to show appreciation
🏆 View top-liked recipes
🔍 Filter options for all recipes
📱 Fully responsive design

description: PageFlow is a full-stack library management platform where users can add, update, borrow, and return books with ease. The system provides a smooth and responsive interface, secure authentication, and efficient book tracking for a seamless user experience.
features: 📚 Add new books to the library
✏️ Update existing book details
📖 Borrow book functionality
🔄 Return borrowed books
📱 Fully responsive design
